name: Keruvim Shipyards Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enables heavy industry to produce the mainline ships used by Keruvim Shipayrds

name: Keruvim Pride Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enables heavy industry to produce the LGBT ships by Keruvim Shipayrds
